articles.title: Secy. Kim Jong Il recommended as WPK General Secretary at provincial Party conferences
articles.content:
Secy. Kim Jong Il recommended as WPK General Secretary at provincial Party conferences
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- South Hamgyong, North Phyongan and North Hamgyong provincial conferences of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) recommended Secretary Kim Jong Il as WPK General Secretary.
   The agenda of the conferences was "on recommending comrade Kim Jong Il, the great leader of our Party and people, as General Secretary of our Party."
   The conferences stressed that Secretary Kim Jong Il with distinguished qualities and charisma has performed valuable exploits by wisely leading all affairs of the revolution and construction, including the building of the Party, the state, the people's armed forces, the economy and culture, for more than 30 years.
   The conferences adopted resolutions on recommending Secretary Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of the WPK with unanimous approval, reflecting the will and desire of the Party members and other people.
   The delegates welcomed the adoption of the resolutions with loud applause and warm cheers.
   The reporter and speakers at the South Hamgyong Provincial Conference held on September 24 noted that the Party members and all other people in the province were filled with great emotion and joy at the news that Secretary Kim Jong Il was recommended as WPK General Secretary.
   They ascribed to his tested leadership and constant care the worthy and happy life of people as well as all the achievements and changes in Party work and chemical and mining industries, agriculture, fisheries and all other fields of the national economy and culture and art in the province.
   The reporter and speakers at the North Phyongan Provincial Conference held on September 25 said that the conference would be a historic meeting which opens a new turning point in carrying forward the Juche revolution generation after generation as it recommended Secretary Kim Jong Il as WPK General Secretary, reflecting the unanimous will and desire of the province's Party members and other people.
   They expressed belief that under his wise leadership, the Party's revolutionary economic strategy will be carried out and the socialist economy of Korea will develop onto a new higher stage in the near future.
   The reporter and speakers at the North Hamgyong Provincial Conference held on September 26 said the Party members and other people in the province were filled with the revolutionary resolution to elect Secretary Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of the glorious WPK and complete the Juche revolution.
   They vowed to uphold him, the destiny of the Korean people and banner of victory, with loyalty, filial devotion and achievements.
   Present at the conferences were Han Song Ryong, politburo member and Secretary of the WPK Central Committee and delegate of the Hamhung City Party Organisation= Hong Song Nam, alternate politburo member of the WPK Central Committee and delegate of the Sinuiju City Party Organisation= Kong Jin Thae, delegate of the Sinuiju City Party Organisation= Choe Yong Rim, alternate politburo member of the WPK Central Committee and delegate of the Chongjin City Party Organisation= and delegates from city and county Party organisations, other units of the same level and primary Party organisations of provincial institutions.

articles.title: Flowers come into bloom in Korea
articles.content:
Flowers come into bloom in Korea
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Cherry flowers have come into bloom at a time when the whole of Korea is replete with great joy and pleasure at the news that local Party conferences have adopted resolutions on recommending Secretary Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   A cherry tree grows in the front yard of the house of Kim Chun Sik, Secretary of the Primary Party Committee of the forestry station in Pakchon county, North Phyongan Province.
   The tree has put out 32 flowers, drawing the attention of the villagers.
   In another development, a pear tree, which grows at a port material supply agency in Sinuiju located on the River Amnok, has put out 55 flowers, giving delight to its employees and passers-by.
   The witnesses said that it seems nature is congratulating the Korean people on their great pride and honor of being blessed with great leaders generation after generation.

articles.title: Ceremony for naming school after Kim Song Ju
articles.content:
Ceremony for naming school after Kim Song Ju
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Taedongmun Primary School was renamed Kim Song Ju Primary School.
   In July, the Central People's Committee of the DPRK issued a decree on naming the school after Kim Song Ju, the childhood name of President Kim Il Sung, representing the unanimous desire of the people, youth, students and schoolchildren across the country to hand down the undying exploits he performed for the education of the rising generation. 
   Ryang Man Gil, Chairman of the Pyongyang Municipal Administrative and Economic Committee, made a speech at the naming ceremony on September 26.
   The speaker recalled that the President visited the school time and again and brightly indicated the orientation and way of educational work.
   He noted that Secretary Kim Jong Il led the school to carry through the Juche-based education idea of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   The school has been awarded the order of Kim Il Sung, an official commendation of the President and the national flag of the DPRK first class and the title of the thrice honored red flag school.

articles.title: Minju Joson on reckless military moves of U.S.. war maniacs
articles.content:
Minju Joson on reckless military moves of U.S. war maniacs
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Papers here today frontpage news of South Hamgyong, North Phyongan and North Hamgyong provincial conferences of the Workers' Party of Korea under the title "to elect great comrade Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of WPK is a highest honor of our Party and people".
   According to the press, Japanese newspapers reported the Party confernece of the Korean People's Army which unanimously adopted a resolution on recommending Secretary Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of the WPK.
   Papers edit words of people of all strata on the conferences.
   Minju Joson runs an article titled "endless journey for people" illustrated by a picture of Secretary Kim Jong Il setting out on local guidance trip by ship.
   It is reported in the press that monuments to revolutionary history were erected in Sinhung, Yonggwang, Pujon and Jangjin counties to mark the 60th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's advance into Sinhung, South Hamgyong Province in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle and that a meeting was held to commemorate the 60th anniversary of the advance of President Kim Il Sung and comrade Kim Jong Suk, a great communist revolutionary fighter, into Sinhung area.
   Papers convey news that Pyongyang Taedongmun Primary School was renamed Kim Song Ju primary school with due ceremony.
   Papers report that the Acting Chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society sent a letter over radio to the President of south Korea's Red Cross in demand of the repartriation of unconverted long-term prisoners.
   Papers in commentaries denounce the Kim Young Sam regime's war provocative moves against the north.
   Carried in the press is news that the spokesman of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK supported the declaration on the establishment of nuclear-free zone in Central Asia.
   Rodong Sinmun carries a commentary denouncing the Japanese reactionaries' distorted propaganda against the DPRK. 
   Minju Joson runs a commentary on the U.S.. warmongers' moves to stifle the DPRK.
   Papers observe the world day of tourist.

articles.title: Paper on war racket in s. Korea
articles.content:
Paper on war racket in s. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary spirit of the Korean people and People's Army is to answer dialogue with dialogue and strength with strength.
   If the U.S. imperialist aggressors dare to violate even a blade of grass and a tree of our country, we will never pardon them in any case.
   This is stressed by Minju Joson in a signed commentary today.
   Recalling that the Chief Executive of the United States, vociferating about "possible military provocation" by the DPRK, cried that the capabilities of the U.S. troops must be enhanced to defend south Korea from "aggression by north Korea", the news analyst of the paper says:
   The U.S. war maniacs have staged reckless war exercises against the DPRK almost every day with the south Korean puppets while amassing sophisticated lethal weapons and military equipment in south Korea.
   The United States is resorting to cunning moves to shift the responsibility for the heightened tension on the Korean Peninsula onto the DPRK with outcries over fictitio U.S. "possible military provocation by north Korea" and "threat of southward invasion". However, it cannot conceal its true color as the very one who has driven the DPRK-U.S. relations to an extreme phase.
   If the U.S. war maniacs finally unleash war in defiance of our good faith and tolerance, the Korean people and People's Army will mercilessly annihilate the enemy and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Jargon of political idiots
articles.content:
Jargon of political idiots
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today comments on the plan of the Kim Young Sam bellicose regime to set up a "scientized combat training centre" equipped with sophisticated computer systems.
   The news analyst says:
   The plan coincides with the puppets' frantic campaign to review and round off war preparations against the north. 
This is patent proof that their moves to unleash new war are being made in a premeditated, reckless way.
   This campaign fills the whole of south Korea with powder smoke and places the Korean peninsula in a touch-and-go situation.
   There is a limit to our peaceful magnanimity and patience. We will never remain a passive onlooker to their hostile campaign.
   We do not make empty talk.

articles.title: Bloc liaison council of Japan-Korea friendship organisations inaugurated
articles.content:
Bloc liaison council of Japan-Korea friendship organisations inaugurated
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today comments on the Japanese reactionaries' smear campaign against the DPRK.
   The news analyst says:
   Some time ago, a high-level Party official of Japan called for "stabilizing north Korea, which is in difficulties, and effecting its soft-landing."
   As a matter of course, it is true that we are undergoing temporary difficulties due to the tenacious hostile acts of the imperialists and international reactionaries and repeated natural disasters. However, we neither fall pessimistic nor break down in face of the temporary difficulties.
   We defend the socialist motherland and build socialism full of confidence and optimism, smashing every anti-DPRK move of the imperialists and reactionaries. This is the true picture of the DPRK.
   The Japanese reactionaries are resorting to disinformation about the situation of the DPRK in a foolish attempt to impair the image of the man-centred Korean socialism and let people pin some hopes on them.
   Come what may, we will follow the road to socialism, our own choice, and will never pardon anyone for trying to block our onward movement.
   We can live and shape the future without Japan's "worries."

articles.title: Koreans in Japan support recommendation of Secy. Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of WPK
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan support recommendation of Secy. Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of WPK
  Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- A meeting of representatives of different organisations was held in Tokyo on September 19 to inaugurate the Kanto and Koshinetsu Bloc Liaison Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity, an umbrella organisation of Japan-Korea friendship organisations.
   The meeting heard a report on the activities of the friendship organisations in various localities and reached an agreement on the formation of the bloc liaison council.
   It also adopted the statutes of the council and selected its officials.
   The bloc liaison council is aimed at increasing cooperation and solidarity among organisations through exchange and study of information and propaganda to promote a movement for Japan-Korea friendship and solidarity. Its cardinal tasks are an early establishment of diplomatic relations between Japan and the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, defence of national rights of Koreans in Japan, support for a movement for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and a drive for democracy in south Korea, introduction and dissemination of national culture and arts of Korea and promotion of academic and cultural exchanges.

articles.title: Papers mark world tourist day
articles.content:
Papers mark world tourist day
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- A telegram of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) to Secretary Kim Kong Il was adopted at a meeting of the Chongryon headquarters officials which was held in Tokyo on September 25 in support of the resolutions of various conferences of the Workers' Party of Korea on recommending him as General Secretary of the Party.
   The telegram said that Secretary Kim Jong Il is the future and destiny of the country and nation and a symbol of all victory and happiness of Chongryon and Korean residents in Japan.
   All Chongryon officials and Korean residents in Japan ardently wait for the day of glory when the General is elected as head of party and state, and sincerely hope that he will lead the country along the road of victory and glory in the future, too, it noted, and added that they are determined to uphold General Kim Jong Il, who has literary and military accomplishments, talents and virtues, as their great leader and to exalt the glorious Kim Jong Il era to accomplish the patriotic cause of Juche.
   In his report at the meeting, Han Tok Su, Chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, said that to elect the great General as General Secretary of the WPK is the earnest desire and unanimous will of the people in the homeland and all the Chongryon officials and compatriot in Japan, and is a historic event to exalt the glorious Kim Jong Il era and to accomplish the cause of Juche pioneered by the fatherly leader Generalissimo Kim Il Sung generation after generation.
   He called upon them to keep the honour and happiness of having the General as General Secretary of the WPK and to uphold him with loyalty with successful development of Chongryon and the movement of Korean residents in Japan onto a new high stage.

articles.title: Criminal war scenario
articles.content:
Criminal war scenario

   Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang-based newspapers today dedicate articles to the world tourist day.
   Recalling that the DPRK joined the World Tourist Organisation in September 1987, a signed article of Rodong Sinmun says:
   Korea, called a golden tapestry of three-thousand-ri from olden times, abounds in tourist resources.
   Mts. Paektu, Kumgang and Myohyang are well known to the world as renowned tourist resorts. 
   Recent years have witnessed the building of Mts. Chilbo and Kuwol and other places into holiday resorts for the people and tourist resorts equipped with sufficient service facilities under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   The number of foreign tourists who visit Korea is on the yearly increase.
   The DPRK Government has cordially welcomed foreign tourists and provided them with all convenience for their tourist activities in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.
   A signed article of Minju Joson says that the tourist resorts in the DPRK are drawing the attention of foreigners.
   We will make all efforts to develop tourist industry in the future, stresses the paper.

articles.title: DPRK Party and state cadres on election of Secy. Kim Jong Il as WPK General Secretary
articles.content:
DPRK Party and state cadres on election of Secy. Kim Jong Il as WPK General Secretary
  Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) - New "guidelines for U.S.-Japan defense cooperation" was reportedly published on September 23 after a bilateral Security Consultative Committee (SCC) meeting in New York.
   Turning to the purpose and character of the "guidelines", the U.S. and Japan said that this is not aimed at a particular country, but designed to respond to an armed attack on Japan as well as to situations in areas surrounding Japan that have an important influence on Japan's peace and security. The "guidelines", however, is a criminal war scenario designed to invade the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and intensify manoeuvrings of aggression and war in the Asia-Pacific region.
   While engaging themselves in anti-DPRK campaign over the "nuclear issue", the U.S. and Japan started the review of the "guidelines" allegedly to respond to the situations in the Korean Peninsula and other areas surrounding Japan. And they revised the original "guidelines" to cope with the "event of contingency" on the Korean Peninsula, taking issue with the DPRK. The geopolitical areas that the new guidelines cover remain undefined. But, officials of Japan and the United States repeatedly said that the "guidelines" were worked out to aim at the Korean Peninsula before any other areas.
   All the contents of the "guidelines" were reviewed to cope with the "event of contingency" on the Korean Peninsula. The U.S., for example, insisted on choosing civil seaports and airports of Japan opposite to the East Sea of Korea for the use of its troops and the U.S. and Japan had discussions on "economic sanctions," "guerrilla and commando attack," "ballistic missile attack" and other issues against the DPRK.
   The U.S. and Japan alleged that the guidelines is a new development in bilateral defense cooperation.
   The "guidelines" had already begun to be carried into practice before the announcement.
   This shows that the U.S. and Japan are working harder to round off war preparations against the DPRK with the review of the "guidelines" as an occasion.
   Such dangerous and anachronistic moves of the U.S. and Japan wrecking peace and stability in the Asia-Pacific region and the rest of the world cause a great concern of many countries.

articles.title: Gift to Secy. Kim Jong Il from Russian Party
articles.content:
Gift to Secy. Kim Jong Il from Russian Party
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Senior Party and state officials of the DPRK, who participated in local Party conferences to recommend Secretary Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, said in unison that if the Juche revolutionary cause is to be carried forward and accomplished, the General should be elected as WPK General Secretary.
   Vice-President Ri Jong Ok, who is also member of the political bureau of the WPK Central Committee, held an interview with KCNA while participating in the South Phyongan Provincial Party Conference.
   He said:
   "Of course, it is nothing new to say that we should elect comrade Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of our Party."
   "He, together with the great leader President Kim Il Sung, has led our Party."
   "As for a ceremony for electing him as WPK General Secretary, it could have been held three years ago, that is, right after the President passed away."
   "We have repeatedly told the General that all the Party members and working people of the country ardently want him to hold the supreme positions of the Party and state. "
   "Each time, however, he resolutely refused our suggestions."
   "He has been devoted only to the work of holding the President in higher esteem and accomplishing his cause "
    "Through his practical example, he showed us how revolutionaries should uphold the late leader."
   Han Song Ryong, politburo member and Secretary of the WPK Central Committee, who participated in the South Hamgyong Provincial Party Conference, had this to say:
   "While working long by the side of the respected general Kim Jong Il, we have keenly felt his noble qualifications and the greatness of his exploits in leadership. And we heartily realised that the greatness of our Party, the mightiness of our army and the invincibility of our socialism are based precisely on the greatness, mightiness and invincibility of the leadership of our General."
   "While covering the road of the revolution under the guidance of the great general Kim Jong Il, our people have come to firmly believe that only when they are guided by him can the country, the people and the revolution develop and win without fail."
   Hong Song Nam, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, who participated in the North Phyongan Provincial Party Conference, said:
   "At this most meaningful place in which we are recommending the great general Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of our Party, I, representing the deepest reverence and unbounded loyalty and filial piety of our people, extend the greatest glory and the warmest congratulations to the General who has performed undying valuable exploits for our Party and country, the time and humankind with outstanding and refined guidance as intended by the President in his lifetime."
   Choe Yong Rim, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, who participated in the North Hamgyong Provincial Party Conference, pointed out:
   "Through their experience in life, our Party members and people have heartily felt the greatness of the General and his wise leadership."
   "It is their absolute faith that, if the revolutionary cause of the President is to be carried forward at this time when the Juche revolution has entered a new era, they should have the General as General Secretary of the Party."
   Kim Ki Nam, Secretary of the WPK Central Committee, who participated in the Pyongyang Municipal Party Conference, said that Secretary Kim Jong Il is the recognised leader of our Party and revolution and that the world highly praises him as the most distinguished political leader and military strategist and an elder statesman of the socialist movement in the present time."

articles.title: Vice-President Ri Jong Ok meets Russian delegation
articles.content:
Vice-President Ri Jong Ok meets Russian delegation
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) - Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Agrarian Party of Russia.
   Its Chairman Mikhail Lapshin, on a visit to Korea, handed the gift to Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry spokesman on guidelines for U.S.-Japan defence cooperation
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry spokesman on guidelines for U.S..-Japan defence cooperation
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Ri Jong Ok, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and Vice-President, met and had a friendly talk with the visiting delegation of the Agrarian Party of Russia led by its Chairman Mikhail Lapshin at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
   The head of the delegation said:
   "I am very happy that I am visiting Korea in a historical period when the Koreans are recommending the respected comrade Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of the WPK."    
   He that through the visit to Korea he could know that the western propaganda is completely false and the Korean people overcome the difficulties full of confidence.
   He expresed the belief that the Korean people would achieve the prosperity of the country under the wise leadership of Secretary Kim Jong Il.
